turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Happy Labor Day! Ever heard of an organization called Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Happy Labor Day and yes I have! Its wonderful organization

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yea they are one of the better charities I've seen around. Did you know we can donate to them directly via this task?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: No, that is great! I can donate any amount

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yea at the end of the task it will let us select any amount from our task payment to donate directly to Save the Children!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Wow, ok and is this where kids are located over seas in horrible living conditions.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yea they focus their efforts on children in particularly dire circumstances. A lot of their work is done in Africa.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Bless those childrens hearts, when can i donate to them.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Once we finish the chat it'll give us a short survey and than the donation option. I think I'm going to donate 50% of my payment to the kids, how much do you think you'll give?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I was thinking the same thing!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Great minds think alike! With enough of us giving it can make a huge difference in their lives.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Im sure it can and Now im even more interested in actually checking out the webpage.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: You most certainly should check them out, I was happy to see how much of a % really goes to the children with this group. Some not-for-profits focus way too much on their CEO's paycheck for my tastes - but not this one!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: You are right! its too easy for big companies to get away with it. It was great chatting with you.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It was nice chatting with you as well, glad to find someone of a similar mind set on these chat HITs. Yea when I heard about how much some of the management makes  at some charities it really boils my blood. They deserve a salary and all, but they shouldn't be making insane money at the cost of the charity

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, that is insane, Wish you a great one on Labor Day, enjoy the day.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: It's such a beautiful Labor Day, soon I plan to take my son out to the park and later I think we'll grill some food up outside. Do you have any plans for the day?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How nice!! Unfortunately, I live in the south, and it has been and will be raining all day. So a good movie and good food is our plan now to spend the day.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Aw sorry to hear that, but at least you'll still have the good food! I hope you enjoy the day and maybe before it's over there will be a beautiful rainbow to cheer everyone up!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hopefully, but family time is what matters right, rain or shine! I actually love the rain, so for me its not that big of a deal.
